text: His resolve grows stronger, he feels a firm resolve taking shape inside him. He feels that there is no other choice, his children's well-being comes before all else. The idea of divorce, though a difficult one for him, feels inevitable. He feels a strange sense of peace settle within him, having finally come to terms with the decision that his heart and mind had somehow always known was necessary...
trans: Sa détermination se renforce, il sent une volonté ferme se dessiner en lui. Il sent qu'il n'y a pas d'autre choix. Le bien-être de ses enfants passe avant tout. L'idée du divorce, bien que difficile pour lui, semble inévitable. Il ressent un étrange sentiment de paix s'installer en lui, ayant finalement accepté la décision que son cœur et son esprit ont toujours su être nécessaire...
